name: Sleep Little Dragon
description:
There's a dragon's ghost blocking the way of the mage. The mage is old and weak, he have no way to defeat the dragon. Lucklly, he has a companion spirit that can sing to put the dragon to sleep.

Game created for the 20 Second Game Jam. I may still polish this game before the jam ends.

This game is actually an experiment that I decided to do to use expand a previous game, Quest for the Youth Potion, which I am working on to make a bigger game. You can see some of the work I did for the QYP on this game, as it shares a lot of the assets I created for the new version.
